name: Doc Fizzix The Enforcer Rubber Band Vehicle/Racer Kit: Designed for Speed and Distance
short_description: Perfect rubber band racer kit for beginners and seasoned veterans alike. Designed and engineered for success by a former award winning Texas physics teacher. Comes ready-to-assemble with pre-cut and pre-drilled lightweight balsa wood.

This rubber band vehicle kit comes with light-weight brass tubing axles that spin with less friction for increase speed and distance, and do not warp like wood dowels, for a smoother ride without wobble.

Includes Doc Fizzix's flexible rubber CD/DVD wheel spacers that are designed to act as shock absorbers to damper small bumps and imperfections in the road surface providing for a smoother ride that will increase both the speed and distance of your rubber band vehicle project.

Includes Doc Fizzix’s Ultra thin, low-inertia wheels that are the same diameter as a regular sized compact disk but are only half the thickness, therefor our wheels have only half the rotational inertia of a normal sized CD/DVD. Less rotational inertia means your rubber band vehicle will travel further and faster compared to a normal thickness CD wheel.
Engineered to be a top performing long distance traveler but can easily be adjusted and modified to meet any rubber band powere vehicle contest and/or STEM challenges
Features Doc Fizzix's easy-wind, snag-free propulsion system designed specifically for rubber band powered racers
Features Doc Fizzix’s pulley launch system for a rocket start and a more efficient storing of energy
Finished vehicle measures approximately 5 x 4.5 x 21.5 inches (H x W x D)
All our products are 100% made in the U.S.A by Doc Fizzix in Spicewood, TX
product_description: DESCRIPTION: The Enforcer is the perfect rubber band racer kit for beginners and seasoned veterans alike. The Enforcer is an easy-to-build, top performing, rubber band racer that can be assembled in a variety of different way making the Enforcer the perfect rubber band racer for just about any type of contest you can dream up. The Enforcer Kit comes ready-to-assemble with pre-cut and pre-drilled parts so you can be ready for action, and racing on the same day. As with all our kits, The Enforcer Kit comes with step-by-step instructions that are filled with tons of top secret performance tips and tricks that have been developed exclusively by Doc Fizzix so that you will have all the information you need to make The Enforcer Kit a winner. Includes our "easy-to-wind" and "snag-free " string release system that will not tangle and/or snag, a technique that was designed exclusively by Doc Fizzix to increase the performance of your vehicle. PERFORMANCE UPGRADES: The Enforcer uses our all new revolutionary pulley launch system that is designed to maximized the potential energy of a stretched rubber band into kinetic energy with almost zero loss of energy. The secret to the pulley launch system is that it is designed to stretches the rubber band instead of winding it as is common with other rubber band vehicles; our launch system will double the power output and double the torque of the system causing the Enforcer to "rocket" off the start line with an almost unfair advantage. TRAVEL DISTANCE: 30-45 meters (98 - 148 feet) The Enforcer comes with ultra-thin, low inertia, DVD layer wheels that are the same diameter as a normal CD/DVD but only half the thickness. Because these wheels are only half the thickness compared to a normal CD/DVD they have only half the rotational inertia and your vehicle will have a greater acceleration and a greater travel distance compared to a similar vehicle using normal CDs/DVDs. The travel distance will increase from 5-15 meters further compared to a similar vehicle using normal thickness CD/DVD wheels. INCLUDES THE FOLLOWING: Rubber band Kevlar high-tech string Pre-cut and pre-drilled balsa wood frame Low inertia DVD layer wheels DVD wheel adapters Brass tubing axles Thrust washers snag-free Pulley launch system TOOLS REQUIRED: Super glue Size: length = 21 inches, width = 4.5 inches This product is not a toy, it is a science hobby kit that requires the use of tools, glue, and problem solving. This product is intended for ages 13 and up only. This product is most often used in high school science classes.
product_details: Age Range (Description) Ages: 13 years and up
